description: The Bittersweet Ski Resort Snow Report brought to you by SnoCountry brings you the latest snow fall, snow surface conditions,  base depth, trail, and lift operations information.
exampleInteractions: Alexa, ask Bittersweet Ski Resort for the snow report
Alexa, ask Bittersweet Ski Resort for latest conditions

name: Snow Report for Bittersweet Ski Resort
shortDescription: The Bittersweet Ski Resort Snow Report brought to you by SnoCountry provides the latest ski and snowboarding conditions for Bittersweet Ski Resort.
